metadata.name: Augeo System Health Dashboard
metadata.description: Real-time system health metrics including request rate, response time, error rate, and availability

tiles.title: Request Rate
tiles.query: requests | summarize count() by bin(timestamp, 5m) | render timechart

tiles.title: Response Time (Percentiles)
tiles.query: requests | summarize avg(duration), percentile(duration, 50), percentile(duration, 95), percentile(duration, 99) by bin(timestamp, 5m) | render timechart

tiles.title: Error Rate
tiles.query: requests | summarize total = count(), failed = countif(success == false) by bin(timestamp, 5m) | extend errorRate = (failed * 100.0) / total | render timechart

tiles.title: Availability
tiles.query: requests | where timestamp > ago(1h) | summarize availability = (count() - countif(success == false)) * 100.0 / count()

tiles.title: Top Endpoints by Request Count
tiles.query: requests | where timestamp > ago(1h) | summarize count() by name | order by count_ desc | take 10

tiles.title: Slowest Endpoints (P95)
tiles.query: requests | where timestamp > ago(1h) | summarize count = count(), p95 = percentile(duration, 95) by name | where count > 10 | order by p95 desc | take 10

tiles.title: Failed Requests by Type
tiles.query: requests | where timestamp > ago(1h) and success == false | summarize count() by resultCode

tiles.title: Database Response Time
tiles.query: dependencies | where type == 'SQL' | summarize avg(duration), percentile(duration, 95) by bin(timestamp, 5m) | render timechart

tiles.title: Redis Cache Hit Rate
tiles.query: dependencies | where type == 'Redis' | summarize hits = countif(success == true), total = count() by bin(timestamp, 5m) | extend hitRate = (hits * 100.0) / total | render timechart

tiles.title: Active Users (Last Hour)
tiles.query: customEvents | where name == 'UserLogin' and timestamp > ago(1h) | summarize users = dcount(tostring(customDimensions.userId))
